body_html:
@drpngx Thanks for the test code. Unfortunately it does not work on my system. I get the following error:

InvalidArgumentError (see above for traceback): Cannot assign a device to node 'ScatterNd': Could not satisfy explicit device specification '/device:GPU:0' because no supported kernel for GPU devices is available. [[Node: ScatterNd = ScatterNd[T=DT_FLOAT, Tindices=DT_INT32, _device="/device:GPU:0"](ScatterNd/indices, ScatterNd/updates, ScatterNd/shape)]]

body:
@drpngx Thanks for the test code. Unfortunately it does not work on my system. I get the following error:

`InvalidArgumentError (see above for traceback): Cannot assign a device to node 'ScatterNd': Could not satisfy explicit device specification '/device:GPU:0' because no supported kernel for GPU devices is available.
	 [[Node: ScatterNd = ScatterNd[T=DT_FLOAT, Tindices=DT_INT32, _device="/device:GPU:0"](ScatterNd/indices, ScatterNd/updates, ScatterNd/shape)]]
`
